metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14938 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in map.c in FreedroidRPG 1.0rc2. It assumes lengthsof data sets read from saved game files. It copies data from a file into afixed-size heap-allocated buffer without size verification, leading to aheap-based buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: freedroidrpg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
